import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import sanityClient from '../client' export default function Project() { const [projectData, setProjectData] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { sanityClient .fetch( `*[_type == "project"]{ title, date, place, description, projectType, link, tags }`, ) .then((data) => setProjectData(data)) .catch(console.error) }, []) return (

My Projects

Welcome to my Projects Page

{project.title}

) }
